title: Shocking! A Tamil piracy website dares to live-stream Suriya’s Singam 3 on Feb 9
text:
Shruti Haasan unveils her bold avatar during GQ magazine shoot! 
While the Suriya is gearing for a grand release of Singam 3 on Feb 9, producers have a cause for concern. As we all know, movies across industries have fallen prey to the evil game of piracy, countless times. The latest movie to be fighting this piracy battle is Singam 3 . As per an article written by Sreedhar Pillai, Tamil rockers, a piracy website is planning to live-stream Singam 3 on the day of its release at 11am. This website had the audacity to tweet out this news. #MarkYourCalender February 9th is not your day our day.. #TamilRockers. W hat has it come to, when piracy websites proudly make such disturbing announcements, and nothing is done about it. This is taking piracy to whole new level ( read shameful and atrocious) Obviously KE Gnanavel Raja of Studio Green, who happens to be producing Singam 3 is enraged and reportedly will take on this website and make sure he will bring justice to the administrators of the website.
